subject: Athletics and Sports
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards will be allowed to keep his U.A.W.-Dodge 400 victory, but he dropped from first to seventh in the standings and his crew chief was fined and suspended six races.
snippet: Carl Edwards will be allowed to keep his U.A.W.-Dodge 400 victory, but he dropped from first to seventh in the standings and his crew chief was fined and suspended six races.
